languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, поздравляю с победой! Весь корабль с нетерпением ждал вестей об успехе вашей вылазки! Слухи о том, что вы не просто спасли монастырь техножрецов, но и покончили с зачинщицей мятежа, стремительно распространяются — вокс-передачи всего мира кричат об этом!"

"Congratulations on the victory, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The entire vessel was impatiently awaiting the news of your expedition's success! The rumours about you not simply saving the Tech-Priests' monastery but actually eliminating the source of the mutiny are spreading like wildfire — the vox-transmissions from across the world speak of nothing else!"
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, поздравляю с победой! Весь корабль с нетерпением ждал вестей об успехе вашей вылазки! Слухи о том, что вы не просто спасли монастырь техножрецов, но и покончили с зачинщицей мятежа, стремительно распространяются — вокс-передачи всего мира кричат об этом!"

traits.locale_text: "Congratulations on the victory, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The entire vessel was impatiently waiting for the news of your expedition's success! The rumours about you not simply saving the tech-priests' monastery but actually eliminating the source of the mutiny are spreading like wildfire — the vox-transmissions from across the world speak of nothing else!"

"Congratulations on the victory, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The entire vessel was impatiently waiting for the news of your expedition's success! The rumours about you not simply saving the tech-priests' monastery but actually eliminating the source of the mutiny are spreading like wildfire — the vox-transmissions from across the world speak of nothing else!"

"Congratulations on the victory, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The entire vessel impatiently awaited news of your expedition's success! The rumours about you not simply saving the Tech-Priests' monastery but actually eliminating the source of the mutiny are spreading like wildfire — the vox-transmissions all over the world speak of nothing else!"

"Congratulations on the victory, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The entire vessel impatiently awaited news of your expedition's success! The rumours about you not simply saving the Tech-Priests' monastery but actually eliminating the source of the mutiny are spreading like wildfire — the vox-transmissions all over the world speak of nothing else!"

"Congratulations on the victory, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The entire vessel impatiently awaited news of your expedition's success! The rumours about you not simply saving the Tech-Priests' monastery but actually eliminating the source of the mutiny are spreading like wildfire — the vox-transmissions all over the world speak of nothing else!"

languages.text: « Je vous félicite pour cette victoire, Votre Seigneurie ! Tout le vaisseau attendait avec impatience l'annonce du succès de votre expédition ! Et non {mf|content|contente} de sauver le monastère des technoprêtres, vous avez réussi à mater la mutinerie en remontant jusqu'à sa source. La nouvelle se répand comme une traînée de poudre, votre exploit est au centre de toutes les transmissions-vox de la planète ! »
languages.original_text: "Congratulations on the victory, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The entire vessel was impatiently awaiting the news of your expedition's success! The rumours about you not simply saving the Tech-Priests' monastery but actually eliminating the source of the mutiny are spreading like wildfire — the vox-transmissions from across the world speak of nothing else!"

traits.locale_text: « Je vous félicite pour cette victoire, Votre Seigneurie ! Tout le vaisseau attendait avec impatience l'annonce du succès de votre expédition ! Et non {mf|content|contente} de sauver le monastère des technoprêtres, vous avez réussi à mater la mutinerie en remontant jusqu'à sa source. La nouvelle se répand comme une traînée de poudre, votre exploit est au centre de toutes les transmissions-vox de la planète ! »

languages.text: "Glückwunsch zum Sieg, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Das gesamte Schiff hat schon ungeduldig auf die Nachricht vom Erfolg Eurer Expedition gewartet! Die Gerüchte, dass Ihr das Kloster der Techpriester nicht nur gerettet, sondern auch die Quelle der Meuterei ausgeschaltet habt, verbreiten sich wie ein Lauffeuer – die Voxübertragungen in der ganzen Welt sprechen von nichts anderem!"
languages.original_text: "Congratulations on the victory, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The entire vessel was impatiently awaiting the news of your expedition's success! The rumours about you not simply saving the Tech-Priests' monastery but actually eliminating the source of the mutiny are spreading like wildfire — the vox-transmissions from across the world speak of nothing else!"

traits.locale_text: "Glückwunsch zu Eurem Sieg, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft! Das gesamte Schiff hat gespannt auf die Nachricht vom Erfolg Eurer Expedition gewartet! Das Gerücht, dass Ihr nicht nur das Kloster der Techpriester gerettet, sondern auch noch die Quelle der Meuterei eliminiert habt, verbreitet sich wie ein Lauffeuer. Die Voxübertragungen auf der Welt sprechen von nichts anderem!"

"Glückwunsch zu Eurem Sieg, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft! Das gesamte Schiff hat gespannt auf die Nachricht vom Erfolg Eurer Expedition gewartet! Das Gerücht, dass Ihr nicht nur das Kloster der Techpriester gerettet, sondern auch noch die Quelle der Meuterei eliminiert habt, verbreitet sich wie ein Lauffeuer. Die Voxübertragungen auf der Welt sprechen von nichts anderem!"

languages.text: «¡Enhorabuena por la victoria, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡La nave entera esperaba noticias del éxito de la expedición! Los rumores sobre el que no solo ha salvado el monasterio de tecnosacerdotes sino que también ha erradicado el origen del motín corren como reguero de pólvora. ¡Es lo único de lo que hablan las transmisiones de voco de todo el planeta!».
languages.original_text: "Congratulations on the victory, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The entire vessel was impatiently awaiting the news of your expedition's success! The rumours about you not simply saving the Tech-Priests' monastery but actually eliminating the source of the mutiny are spreading like wildfire — the vox-transmissions from across the world speak of nothing else!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Enhorabuena por la victoria, mi{mf|lord|lady}! ¡La nave entera esperaba noticias del éxito de la expedición! Los rumores sobre el que no solo ha salvado el monasterio de tecnosacerdotes sino que también ha erradicado el origen del motín corren como reguero de pólvora. ¡Es lo único de lo que hablan las transmisiones de voco de todo el planeta!».

languages.text: “祝贺您获得胜利，大人！整艘船都在迫不及待地传播着这场远征胜利的好消息！人们都说您不仅拯救了技术神甫的修道院，还消灭了叛变的源头，这些好消息正像野火一样蔓延开来！整个世界的音阵系统都在谈论这件事情！”
languages.original_text: "Congratulations on the victory, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The entire vessel was impatiently awaiting the news of your expedition's success! The rumours about you not simply saving the Tech-Priests' monastery but actually eliminating the source of the mutiny are spreading like wildfire — the vox-transmissions from across the world speak of nothing else!"

traits.locale_text: “祝贺您获得胜利，大人！整艘船都在迫不及待地传播着这场远征胜利的好消息！人们都说您不仅拯救了技术神甫的修道院，还消灭了叛变的源头，这些好消息正像野火一样蔓延开来！整个世界的音阵系统都在谈论这件事情！”
“祝贺您获得胜利，大人！整艘船都在迫不及待地传播着这场远征胜利的好消息！人们都说您不仅拯救了技术神甫的修道院，还消灭了叛变的源头，这些好消息正像野火一样蔓延开来！整个世界的音阵系统都在谈论这件事情！”

languages.text: 「偉大な勝利、おめでとうございます！船全体があなたの遠征成功の知らせを待ち焦がれていたのです！技術司祭の修道院を救っただけでなく、反乱の元凶を排除したという噂は野を焼く炎のごとく広まっています。…世界からのヴォクス通信はそのことで持ちきりです！」
languages.original_text: "Congratulations on the victory, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The entire vessel was impatiently awaiting the news of your expedition's success! The rumours about you not simply saving the Tech-Priests' monastery but actually eliminating the source of the mutiny are spreading like wildfire — the vox-transmissions from across the world speak of nothing else!"

traits.locale_text: 「偉大な勝利、おめでとうございます！船全体があなたの遠征成功の知らせを待ち焦がれていたのです！技術司祭の修道院を救っただけでなく、反乱の元凶を排除したという噂は野を焼く炎のごとく広まっています。…世界からのヴォクス通信はそのことで持ちきりです！」

languages.text: "Zaferini tebrik ederim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Tüm gemi, sabırsızlıkla keşfinin başarılarıyla dolu haberleri duymayı bekliyor! Yalnızca Tekno Rahiplerin manastırını kurtarmakla kalmayıp aynı zamanda başkaldırının kaynağını da ortaya kaldırdığına dair çıkan söylentiler süratle yayılıyor. Dünyanın dört bir yanından yayılan voks iletilerinin tek bahsettiği bu!"
languages.original_text: "Congratulations on the victory, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! The entire vessel was impatiently awaiting the news of your expedition's success! The rumours about you not simply saving the Tech-Priests' monastery but actually eliminating the source of the mutiny are spreading like wildfire — the vox-transmissions from across the world speak of nothing else!"
